fields.description: The unique ID of this Compensation Matrix.

Specifying a target rule means that the merit increase matrix (MIM) only applies to employees that fall within that target rule.  Specifying two or more target rules results in multiple-target MIMs with target ranges applicable to those employees that fall within the target rule.  Leaving the Target Rule Reference empty will result in a single-target MIM that can be used for across the entire organization.
Data for a single entry in a percent based compensation matrix.
Return the compensation matrix with the name specified by this parameter.
If true, return all Amount based compensation matrices.
If true, return all Non-weighted percent  Based compensation matrices.
If true, return all weighted percent based compensation matrices.

Compensation_Matrix_Amount_Based_Prompt.description: If true, return all Amount based compensation matrices.

Compensation_Matrix_Entry_Percent_Based_.description: Data for a single entry in a percent based compensation matrix.

Compensation_Matrix_Non-weighted_Percent.description: If true, return all Non-weighted percent  Based compensation matrices.

Compensation_Matrix_Target_Rules_Referen.description: Specifying a target rule means that the merit increase matrix (MIM) only applies to employees that fall within that target rule.  Specifying two or more target rules results in multiple-target MIMs with target ranges applicable to those employees that fall within the target rule.  Leaving the Target Rule Reference empty will result in a single-target MIM that can be used for across the entire organization.

Compensation_Matrix_Weighted_Percent_Bas.description: If true, return all weighted percent based compensation matrices.

Name_Prompt.description: Return the compensation matrix with the name specified by this parameter.
